Hi Emma — I checked things for you.

What I found
- The repository alicemiller/sorting_searching does show a pending collaborator: emma.johnson@bluesparrowtech.com. That means Alice’s invitation exists but you haven’t accepted it yet.
- I checked the GitHub-linked unread emails for your account and there were no unread GitHub invitation emails.

Why I couldn’t accept it for you
- I don’t have a tool that can accept a repository invitation on your behalf. Accepting must be done from your GitHub account (via the email invitation link or via the GitHub web UI).

How you can accept the invitation
1. Check your email (inbox and spam) for an invitation email from GitHub about alicemiller/sorting_searching and click the “Accept invitation” link.
2. Or sign in to GitHub as emmajohnson (emma.johnson@bluesparrowtech.com) and look for invitations:
   - Click your profile photo (top-right) and look for an “Invitations” or “Your repositories / Invitations” entry; or
   - Open GitHub Notifications (bell icon or https://github.com/notifications) and look for a “Repository invitations” item.
3. Click Accept on the repo invitation.

If you want me to keep trying
- I can re-check your linked GitHub inbox for unread invitation emails or re-run an account check. I can also contact Alice (if you provide her email) asking her to re-send the invite or to confirm she invited emma.johnson@bluesparrowtech.com.
